Boca Juniors fan âš½

I was born in Neuquen near the border with Chile. As an argentinian and a patagonian I was raised with icons such as Messi, Maradona, Mario Quempes or Carlos Tevez. I'm a huge fan of Boca Juniors.

Cooking and gastronomic curiousity ğŸ§…

As most of argentinians, I also have the italian citizenship. Therefore I learned the pleasure of cooking alongside my Nonno and my Nonna. My favorite dish is obviously the national Asado and my Nonna's "Milanesas".

Bikes ğŸ

When my Nonno arrived to Argentina after WW2, the only thing he took with him is his FB Mondial. I think that explaines why I'm passionate about motorbikes .
